derivation: from G4862 (συσχηματίζω) and a derivative of G4976 (συσχηματίζω);
kjv_def: conform to, fashion self according to
strongs_def: to fashion alike, i.e. conform to the same pattern (figuratively)
outline: 1. to conform one's self (i.e. one's mind and character) to another's pattern, (fashion one's self according to)
